name: StageMechanic
description:
StageMechanic is a block-pushing 3D action/puzzle game inspired by Catherine, Robo5, Pushmo, Bloxels, Sokoban, and Mario Maker. Create, play and share your own block-pushing puzzle games!

StageMechanic is an Open Source project developed by volunteers. It is currently in active development with fully functional preview versions available for desktop/laptop and Android.

We were recently featured in the Arts section of the Shoofly Magazine

Keyboard Controls Play mode:

Move player: arrow keys or wasd
Push/pull blocks: [Shift] + arrow keys or wasd
Change background: [F3]
Undo: [Backspace]
Use Item: [Space Bar]

Create mode:

Move cursor up, down, left, right: arrow keys
Move cursor further, closer: comma and period keys
Edit block details: [Enter]
Place blocks quickly: number keys on top row
Delete block: [Delete]
Place player start position: [B]
